variable.name: subjid
variable.description: Subject ID

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Subject's gender.

variable.name: ethnic
variable.description: Identifies the ethnic classifications.

variable.name: rcode
variable.description: Represents the racial background of the subject.
variable.comment: By self-report and confirmed by genotyping.

variable.name: bdage
variable.description: Age at the time the whole blood sample was drawn.

variable.name: juve_onset
variable.description: At time of disease onset less than 16 years old.

variable.name: status_ver
variable.description: Verifies the case meets criteria for the diagnosis of scleroderma and medical records reviewd by the PI.
variable.comment: Based on available medical record documentation such that if features were not specifically described they were considered as not noted.

variable.name: ssctype
variable.description: Identifies the type of scleroderma as 'limited' or 'diffuse' or 'sine' or 'unknown'.
variable.comment: Based on available medical record documentation such that if features were not specifically described they were considered as not noted.

variable.name: acr
variable.description: Indicates whether the case fulfills the 1980 preliminary criteria for SSc with: no= does not meet criteria, 1= meets the major criterion, 2= meets at least 2 of 3 minor criteria. This can be positive if the major or at least 2 of the minor criteria are p
variable.comment: Based on available medical record documentation such that if features were not specifically described they were considered as not noted.

variable.name: crest
variable.description: Number of CREST features documented in medical record.
variable.comment: Based on available medical record documentation such that if features were not specifically described they were considered as not noted.

variable.name: dis_diagag
variable.description: Age at physician's diagnosis.

variable.name: rayonset
variable.description: Age of subject at the onset of Raynaud's phenomenon.
variable.comment: Based on physician's documentation or self-report of subject.

variable.name: nronsetage
variable.description: Age of subject at the onset of first non-Raynaud's symptom.

variable.name: times_preg
variable.description: Number of pregnancies of female subject.

variable.name: qty_births
variable.description: Number of live births of female subject.

variable.name: mult_birth
variable.description: Number of multiple births in a pregnancy.

variable.name: preg_termi
variable.description: Number of pregnancy terminations.

variable.name: qty_lost
variable.description: Number of miscarriages.

variable.name: stillborn
variable.description: Number of stillborns of female subjects.

variable.name: tubal
variable.description: Number of tubal pregnancies of female subjects.

variable.name: bros_full
variable.description: Number of brothers related to subject with the same mother and father.

variable.name: sis_full_q
variable.description: Number of sisters related to subject with the same mother and father.

variable.name: bros_half
variable.description: Number of half brothers related to subject with one mother or father in common.

variable.name: sis_half_q
variable.description: Number of half sisters related to subject with one mother or father in common.

variable.name: child_tota
variable.description: Total number of children (live births) of female subject.

variable.name: qty_boys
variable.description: Number of sons (live births) of female subjects.

variable.name: qty_girls
variable.description: Number of daughters (live births) of female subjects.
